author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, you’ll discover how Arm and Epic Games are empowering developers to achieve new levels of visual quality on mobile.

For maximizing player immersion, mobile gaming demands ever higher-fidelity graphics without compromising performance or battery life. Arm Accuracy Super Resolution (Arm ASR) brings the latest temporal upscaling techniques to Fortnite for console-level quality graphics for mobile devices—at a fraction of the performance cost, and with less time spent optimizing graphics.

Watch this video for a deep-dive into the integration in Fortnite to reveal practical tips for implementing the platform-agnostic, open-source Arm ASR, and how it outperforms traditional methods such as TAA and spatial upscalers, enhancing experiences for developers, publishers, and players.

To find out more about using Unreal Engine for game development, check out our website: unrealengine.com/uses/games

#Fortnite, #ArmASR, #MobileGames, #ArmAccu
title: Fortnite Meets Arm ASR: Unlocking Mobile Graphics with Temporal Upscaling | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025

author: Unreal Engine
description:
In this session recorded at Unreal Fest Orlando 2025, we explore how JetBrains Rider and TeamCity enhance Unreal Engine game development.

Discover Rider’s innovative IDE features, including its built-in AI Assistant, that streamline Unreal project changes. Then, see TeamCity’s role in testing and building changes to an Unreal project via a dynamic CI/CD build pipeline based on a BuildGraph script.

To find out more about Unreal Engine for game development, check out our website: unrealengine.com/uses/games

#JetBrainsRider, #TeamCity, #GameDevelopment, #AI, #CI/CD, #BuildGraph, #UnrealEngine, #UE5, #UnrealFestOrlando
title: Turbocharge Your UE Game Development with JetBrains Rider and TeamCity | Unreal Fest Orlando 2025
